bio: A famed Yo-criminal. While his luck is intact, he uses it to steal erasers and to sneak onto intercom systems to tell lame puns.

soultimate.name: Robo Smile
soultimate.inspiritEffects: Increases own Attack by 25%, Defense by 175%, movement speed by 20% and Move Meter speed by 50% for 30 seconds.
soultimate.description: Recover all HP and all stats are greatly increased.

skill.effect: Increases damage of Earth Element attacks by 25%.
skill.name: Earth Play

name: Nogo
